1.name: The Outlaw
1.description: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.

2.name: Jane Eyre
2.description: After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house, to care for his young daughter.

3.name: San Demetrio London
3.description: The San Demetrio of the title is a British merchant ship in an Atlantic convoy in 1940. Disabled and left to the mercy of patrolling U-boats the crew must keep her afloat and out of harms ...                See full summary »

4.name: Shadow of a Doubt
4.description: A young woman discovers her visiting uncle may not be the man he seems to be.

5.name: The Desperadoes
5.description: A wanted outlaw arrives in town to rob a bank that has already been held up! His past and his friendship with the sheriff land them both in trouble.

6.name: Batman
6.description: Japanese spymaster Prince Daka operates a covert espionage organization located in Gotham City's now-deserted Little Tokyo which turns American scientists into pliable zombies.

7.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
7.description: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

8.name: The Song of Bernadette
8.description: In 1858 France, Bernadette, an adolescent peasant girl, has a vision of "a beautiful lady" in the city dump. She never claims it to be anything other than this, but the townspeople all ...                See full summary »

9.name: Heaven Can Wait
9.description: An old roué arrives in Hades to review his life with Satan, who will rule on his eligibility to enter the Underworld.

10.name: Ossessione
10.description: Gino, a drifter, begins an affair with inn-owner Giovanna as they plan to get rid of her older husband.

11.name: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
11.description: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

12.name: Sahara
12.description: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.

13.name: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
13.description: After being awakened, Larry Talbot chips Frankenstein's Monster out of a block of ice. When Talbot changes to the Wolf Man, the two creatures battle each other.

14.name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
14.description: This lavish, impudent, adult fairy tale takes the viewer from 18th-century Braunschweig to St. Petersburg, Constantinople, Venice, and then to the moon using ingenious special effects, stunning location shooting.

15.name: Phantom of the Opera
15.description: A disfigured violinist haunts the Paris Opera House.

16.name: Day of Wrath
16.description: The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th century Denmark.

17.name: I Walked with a Zombie
17.description: A Canadian nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner, who has been acting strangely, on a Caribbean island.

18.name: Son of Dracula
18.description: Count Alucard finds his way from Budapest to the swamps of the Deep South; his four nemeses are a medical doctor, a university professor, a jilted fiancé and the woman he loves.

19.name: The More the Merrier
19.description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington, two men and a woman share a single apartment and the older man plays Cupid to the other two.

20.name: Five Graves to Cairo
20.description: During World War II, an undercover British soldier tries get word to the Allies that the Germans have tons of supplies buried in five excavations across Egypt.

21.name: The Seventh Victim
21.description: A woman in search of her missing sister uncovers a Satanic cult in New York's Greenwich Village, and finds that they may have something to do with her sibling's random disappearance.

22.name: Dead Men Walk
22.description: The twin of a kindly small-town physician returns from the grave for vengeance against his brother, who secretly killed him because the twin served Satan.

23.name: A Guy Named Joe
23.description: A dead World War II bomber pilot named Pete Sandidge, becomes the guardian angel of another pilot, Ted Randall. He guides Ted through battle and helping him to romance his old girlfriend, despite her excessive devotion to Sandidge's memory.

24.name: Lassie Come Home
24.description: After her destitute family is forced to sell her, a collie named Lassie escapes from her new owner and begins the long trek from Scotland to her Yorkshire home.

25.name: Destination Tokyo
25.description: In order to provide information for the first air raid over Tokyo, a U.S. submarine sneaks into Tokyo Bay and places a spy team ashore.

26.name: Cabin in the Sky
26.description: A compulsive gambler dies during a shooting, but he'll receive a second chance to reform himself and to make up with his worried wife.

27.name: Sonja
27.description: Kurt and Sonja are happily married and dream of buying a house and have children. One day Kurt's old friend Nick pops up. Secrets from Sonja's past life surface.

28.name: My Friend Flicka
28.description: Ken McLaughlin struggles to please his family in any way. He comes back from boarding school boasting poor grades and facing going through the fifth grade again, much to his fathers dismay....                See full summary »

29.name: The Phantom
29.description: Professor Davidson and his niece Diana Palmer search Africa for the Lost City of Zoloz, reputed to be the source of a large hidden treasure. Also searching is a local crook, Singapore Smith...                See full summary »

30.name: Action in the North Atlantic
30.description: An American tanker is sunk by a German U-boat and the survivors spend eleven days at sea on a raft. They're next assigned to the liberty ship "Sea Witch" bound for Murmansk through the sub-stalked North Atlantic.

31.name: Stage Door Canteen
31.description: "Dakota," a young soldier on a pass in New York City, visits the famed Stage Door Canteen, where famous stars of the theatre and films appear and host a recreational center for servicemen ...                See full summary »

32.name: Watch on the Rhine
32.description: A German-born engineer, his American wife and their children travel from Mexico to the United States to visit her family but their plans are complicated by a Romanian count.

33.name: Sanshiro Sugata
33.description: Sugata, a young man, struggles to learn the nuance and meaning of judo, and in doing so comes to learn something of the meaning of life.

34.name: Lady of Burlesque
34.description: After one member of their group is murdered, the performers at a burlesque house must work together to find out who the killer is before they strike again.

35.name: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
35.description: After an all-night send-off party for the troops, a small-town girl wakes up to find herself married and pregnant, but with no memory of her husband's identity.

36.name: Crash Dive
36.description: A submarine lieutenant and his commander fall in love with the same girl.

37.name: The Ghost Ship
37.description: Tom Merriam signs on the ship Altair as third officer under Captain Stone. At first things look good, Stone sees Merriam as a younger version of himself and Merriam sees Stone as the first ...                See full summary »

38.name: Riders of the Deadline
38.description: When Hoppy's falsely accused young friend is killed while supposedly trying to escape from jail, an embittered Hoppy is blamed and drummed out of the Texas Rangers.

39.name: Sherlock Holmes Faces Death
39.description: During WWII several murders occur at a convalescent home where Dr. Watson has volunteered his services. He summons Holmes for help and the master detective proceeds to solve the crime from ...                See full summary »

40.name: Hangmen Also Die!
40.description: After the Nazi administrator of Czechoslovakia is shot, his assassin tries to elude the Gestapo and struggles with his impulse to give himself up as hostages are executed.

41.name: 'Gung Ho!': The Story of Carlson's Makin Island Raiders
41.description: The true story of Carlson's Raiders and their World War II attack on Makin Island.

42.name: The Human Comedy
42.description: Teenager Homer Macauley stays at home in small-town Ithaca to support his family while his older brother Marcus prepares to go to war.

43.name: Journey Into Fear
43.description: An American ballistics expert in Turkey finds himself targeted by Nazi agents. Safe passage home by ship is arranged for him, but he soon discovers that his pursuers are also on board.

44.name: A Lady Takes a Chance
44.description: A city girl on a bus tour of the West encounters a handsome rodeo cowboy who helps her forget her simpy city suitors.

45.name: So Proudly We Hail!
45.description: A group of nurses returning from the war in the Phillippines recall their experiences in combat and in love.

46.name: Tarzan's Desert Mystery
46.description: With Jane still away for the war effort, Tarzan and Boy set off to retrieve rare medicinal herbs, only to run into an American messenger, Nazi spies, and the mysterious desert's treacherous fauna and flora. Will they make it in one piece?

47.name: Le Corbeau
47.description: French village doctor becomes target of poison-pen letters sent to village leaders, accusing him of affairs and practicing abortion.

48.name: Air Force
48.description: The crew of an Air Force bomber arrives in Pearl Harbor in the aftermath of the Japanese attack and is sent on to Manila to help with the defense of the Philippines.

49.name: This Land Is Mine
49.description: A mild-mannered school-teacher in a Nazi-occupied town during W.W.II finds himself being torn between collaboration and resistance.

50.name: Mr. Lucky
50.description: A gambler has plans to swindle money from a charity program, but starts to have second thoughts when he falls for a rich society girl.
